name: RUNR END
description:
RUNR END is a challenging platformer set in a dreamish world.

Pull off cool movements while dodging traps and making precise jumps.
Discover secrets through your journey by paying attention to every detail the world has.
Oh, and I forgot to mention, there are no checkpoints on levels, who needs them anyway?

Be careful,

Features:

  • A challenging campaign - No checkpoints on levels so you gotta be careful
  • Make awesome movements
  • Compete with your friends on Leaderboard
  • Even compete with the DEV itself on Leaderboard :)
  • Discover secrets and earn Achievements through your journey
